content.title: Portfolio
content.description: My personal website to showcase my experience and skills. The website is created using JavasScript with minimal use of HTML and CSS.

content.title: MTG Search Discord Bot
content.description: A Discord bot written in Python to search for a specified card using the MTG API and Beautiful Soup 4. The bot is hosted on a Raspberry Pi R3

content.title: Discord LED Monitor
content.description: Threaded program written in Python to constantly read the user voice status in Discord. The status will be displayed using LEDs. The device is run on an Arduino Uno with PyFirmata loaded on.

content.title: ShiftOutPy
content.description: ShiftOut code adapted to Python from Arduino. The code is made to be used with a 74HC595, an 8-bit Shift Register.

content.title: About Me
content.description: I am a new graduate at Missouri University of Science and Technology with a passion for microcontrollers and programming . I majored in Computer Engineering and minored in History. In my spare time I like to work on small projects, learning new concepts, and working with electronics. Outside of programming, I enjoying playing games with friends and reading.
